name: Strawberry Jam Toast v2.25 edited
description:
So this was requested by a Reddit user looking for something similar to Jam Monster. I thought it was a good idea and interesting profile, so off to work I went. This is version 2.25 after my 7th revision. This is more or less the final version, thanks for looking!

Another edit: AP at 0.5% thanks to chewymidget

Some notes:

*The Jam* 

* This one is simple enough... TPA ripe and INW shisha strawberry show up here as nice and jammy. Some kind of magic with the other ingredients is happening to really get that jam aspect across because I tried this combo by itself and it's not nearly as jammy.

*The Toast*

JF Biscuit + AP + FA hazelnut + FA carmel

* JF Biscuit and AP are the base for the toasty part. Hazel grove at a low % is just contributing some dry, lightly nutty notes to really make the bread seem like dryish toast to be buttered. FA carmel is the last touch to finish our toasted taste. This might be the guy working magic to the strawberry but I feel like its some sort of combo of this and AP and the hazel grove.

*The Butter*

* If you're avoiding acetyl propionyl or acetoin just go ahead and skip this recipe. It would be nothing without the butter and TPA butter has got to be my favorite butter flavor. This guy at this % is giving us the perfect amount of butter without getting in the way of everything else.


Give this one at least one day to come together, 3 days even better. Let me know what you think, or what you'd do differently.  Thanks and happy mixing!


*I have not tried this with INW biscuit but I would sub it at 1% if you must*


Edited : subbed out fa strawberry and used INW shisha strawberry instead
author: hashslingingslashur

reviews.text: You have the toast taste nailed on this one, good job.  The strawberry combo is good, but seems to be lacking.  Very good recipe though.
This is really good.  I have tried a ton of strawberry recipes and they always taste funky to me.   This combination is perfect to me.  Jammy on the inhale and toast on the exhale.  Well done!

This mix is great for getting that fix for strawberry jammed butter toast. I have made this 5 times now playing around with the toast flavor. The toast is just a tad bit too subtle for what I want personally. Having a hard time finding anything that doesn't unbalance the whole mix. In its current state this is still well worth mixing up using common flavors so if you don't have them get them. I personally like this at .5% AP. The newest revision of Shisha Strawberry is a winner. Perfect combo with Strawberry Ripe for a jam flavor. Great mix; very well done!
